text: Hey team, looking to work with Aria Perez for McDonald's. Budget is approx $8,571 - need 1 x Radio interview, 3 x 30-second Instagram reel, 3 x YouTube short, 3 x Facebook story, 1 x 30-second Instagram reel. 12 weeks exclusivity, 5 month engagement. Usage: 8 months. Start date: November 2025.
